hCNV Site now at cnvar.org

The homepage of the hCNV community has now been mapped to the cnvar.org domain.

Since the site is still hosted as a Github Pages project the old hcnv.github.io still works.

The domain is managed by Michael Baudis. Please let him now about e.g. ideas for subdomains/targets; for example we currently map the progenetix.cnvar.org to the Progenetix resource.
